items.stem: How many regulated allergens must be declared in the UK?
items.rationale: UK law recognises 14 allergens for mandatory declaration.

items.stem: Select all that are tree nuts:
items.rationale: Almond and walnut are tree nuts. Sesame is a seed; pine nut is often treated as a seed in grouping.

items.stem: A customer asks if a dish is nut-free and you are unsure. What should you do?
options: Say yes if the recipe looks nut-free
Check the allergen matrix/spec and confirm or escalate
Ask a colleague for their opinion
items.rationale: Use verified information only; escalate if not sure.

options: A safe food picking up traces of an allergen
A food becoming unsafe for everyone
items.rationale: Cross-contact is trace transfer, dangerous for those allergic.
Separation, cleaning and clear labelling are core controls.

items.stem: Which is a regulated allergen group?
items.rationale: Soya is one of the 14 regulated allergens.
